Title: The Second Polaroid
Writer: Hayley Tyler, Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Kirk A. Moore (executive story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Clay hides a secret from his parents. Concerned about his reputation, Marcus lies in court. Jessica and Alex skip school together.
